typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	ContainerName as string ("Dataverse Container Name"),
	TableName as string ("Dataverse Table Name")
}
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	manifestType: 'model') ~> ADLS
ADLS sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	truncate: true,
	umask: 0022,
	preCommands: [],
	postCommands: [],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	saveOrder: 1) ~> Parquet
